Resetting the Password¶

  1. Go to Login with Moonbeam Envision account -> Forgot password

Figure 1¶

  1. When you receive an email (Figure 2) for a Rumii account recovery, press the link and then fill out a new password for your account (Figure 3)

Figure 2¶

Figure 3¶
